pages.title: Radiant Glass
pages.text: You need a way to efficiently light your shelter and other structures.\\What could be better than using the luminous properties of [Shimmerstone](book://resources/shimmerstone) directly in your glass?

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Radiant Glass is pretty much the opposite of Tinted Glass. The [Shimmerstone](book://resources/shimmerstone) used in its manufacture ensures that the glass glows from within.
